    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<RentalPointDto> getAll​(@RequestBody(required=false)
                                             GeolocationSelectionDto selectionModel,
                                             @RequestParam(value="orderBy",defaultValue="id",required=false)
                                             java.lang.String orderBy,
                                             @RequestParam(value="asc",defaultValue="true",required=false)
                                             boolean asc,
                                             @RequestParam(value="limit",defaultValue="10",required=false)
                                             java.lang.Integer limit)
        Getting the list of rental points by selection options.
        NOTE: Geolocations does not contain null values - if the field's value is not specified, it has default value. For the String, it's empty string "".

        Example:
        /v1/rental-points?orderBy=latitude&asc=false&limit=2
        {
        "countryCode": "RUS",
        "district": "МО Замоскворечье"
        }
        Parameters:
        selectionModel - The request body is mapped into GeolocationSelectionDto object - the model to get values from, for executing select query.
        orderBy - Field's name of Geolocation class which is used for ordering result list
        asc - true or false
        limit - Limiting the size of result list.
        Returns:
        selected List<RentalPointDto>

      • getAll

        @GetMapping(params={"lat","lng"})
public java.util.List<RentalPointDto> getAll​(@RequestParam("lat")
                                             java.lang.Double lat,
                                             @RequestParam("lng")
                                             java.lang.Double lng,
                                             @RequestParam(value="limit",defaultValue="10",required=false)
                                             java.lang.Integer limit)
        Getting the closest rental points by coordinates.

        Example:
        /v1/rental-points?lat=57&lng=35&limit=5
        Parameters:
        lat - client's latitude
        lng - client's longitude
        limit - limiting result list size
        Returns:
        List<RentalPointDto> of the closest rental points according to passed coordinates

      • getById

        @GetMapping("/{id}")
public RentalPointDto getById​(@PathVariable("id")
                              java.lang.Long id)
        Getting concrete rental point by its id. NOTE: Normally scooters are not fetched, but this method returns rental point with all the current scooters.

        Example: /v1/rental-points?lat=57.2&lng=37.3&limit=5
        Parameters:
        id - Path variable
        Returns:
        Rental point with current scooters

      • createRentalPoint

        @PostMapping
public void createRentalPoint​(@RequestBody
                              RentalPointCreationDto rentalPointCreationDto)
        Creating rental point via passed RentalPointCreationDto object.
        Note: not passed geolocation parameters will automatically convert to empty string.

        Example:
        {
         "geolocation": {
         "latitude": 59.93137,
         "longitude": 30.36069,
         "countryName": "Россия",
         "city": "Санкт-Петербург",
         "description": "Точка проката у входа на станцию Площадь Восстания"
         }
        }
        Parameters:
        rentalPointCreationDto - DTO for creation RentalPoint

      • createRentalPoint

        @PostMapping(params={"lat","lng"})
public void createRentalPoint​(@RequestParam("lat")
                              java.lang.Double lat,
                              @RequestParam("lng")
                              java.lang.Double lng,
                              @RequestParam(value="desc",defaultValue="",required=false)
                              java.lang.String desc)
        Takes coordinates, gets address via HERE api, and create a rental point with that address.
        Example:
        /v1/rental-points?lat=59.93&lng=30.36&desc=Точка проката рядом с магазином KFC
        Parameters:
        lat - rental point's latitude
        lng - rental point's longitude
        desc - optional parameters which can be set at geolocation's description. If not - will be filled with the label of the HERE api response's address. Recommend to set it for more accurate defining the location (e.g. mentioning the closest landmarks)

      • updateGeolocationOfRentalPoint

        @PatchMapping("/{id}")
public void updateGeolocationOfRentalPoint​(@PathVariable("id")
                                           java.lang.Long id,
                                           @RequestBody
                                           GeolocationUpdateDto updateModel)
        Updating rental point via passed GeolocationUpdateDto object NOTE: skipped values are automatically set to null and null values are never set to entity.
        Parameters:
        id - rental point's identifier
        updateModel - instance of GeolocationUpdateDto to take fields and their values for updating from

      • deleteRentalPoint

        @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
public void deleteRentalPoint​(@PathVariable("id")
                              java.lang.Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of the deleting rental point
